stage1.title: When the Stars Shine
stage1.description: Complete an entire show in the Imaginarium Theater having obtained 6 Stella.

stage2.title: When the Stars Shine
stage2.description: Complete an entire show in the Imaginarium Theater having obtained 8 Stella.

stage3.title: When the Stars Shine
stage3.description: Complete an entire show in the Imaginarium Theater having obtained 10 Stella.
